text: Conrack is a 1974 American autobiographical drama movie directed by Martin Ritt and based on the 1972 autobiographical book The Water is Wide by Pat Conroy. It stars Jon Voight, Paul Winfield, Tina Andrews and Antonio Fargas and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1974 drama movies Category:1970s biographical movies Category:American biographical movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Martin Ritt Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:Movies composed by John Williams Category:Movies set in the 1960s Category:Movies set in South Carolina Category:Movies about educators Category:Movies about children Category:Movies set in schools Category:African-American movies
title: Conrack (1974 movie)
